llm.feedback:
Up | 0–3 weeks | Strengthen the near-term causal chain from tariff announcements to relative prices and domestic capex with explicit triggers (25% auto tariff pass-through; chip/AI infra capex milestones) and link to ROIC and discount-rate dynamics | Watch tariff timetables and the pace/profitability of chip/EV investments as regime-progression signals | 60% (QGXA2WQJ3)(WTNT85IPR)(SGB2PAZGK)
Up | 3–6 months | AI/EV leadership regime—Nvidia centrality to compute demand expands leadership in AI infra, with the AI-30 list broadening to CrowdStrike, Roblox, GE Vernova, and Nebius | Watch Nvidia demand signals, AI infra capex cadence, and the AI-30 reshuffle as regime tilt indicators | 25–35% (WTNT85IPR)(STBVARD8F)(4661GWFP7)
Down | 3–6 months | Tariff-escalation regime—potential 25% auto-import tariff could lift inflation pass-through and compress cyclicals, triggering risk-off re-pricing and tighter equity multiples | Watch tariff timetables, pass-through dynamics, and KO/PG/SBUX cash-flow sensitivity to auto capex | 20–30% (WTNT85IPR)(SGB2PAZGK)
Down | 3–6 months | Ally realignment/constructive thaw regime—major ally tariff reconfigurations and inflation persistence could push up discount rates and shift capital toward defensive assets | Watch ally tariff shifts and inflation persistence signals, plus policy cues from Jackson Hole and semiconductor capex cadence as near-term tests | 10–20% (SGB2PAZGK)(NL5YYTLF2)
